instructions: Connect your TV to the same Wi-Fi network as your Android device. Install recent updates on your Android device. Find out how to check for the latest Android version . Update the apps on your Android device. Learn how to get the latest version of your apps . Get the most recent version of the Google app: On your Android device, go to the Google app page and tap Install or Update . If you see "Installed," you already have the latest version. To start the setup, on your Android device, open your Google app and say, "Set up my Assistant device." Tip: You can also visit g.co/assistant/setup from a web browser like Chrome or Firefox. Follow the onscreen instructions.
